entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.4.2
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 322c1ccc509233384561335854ea8f4d6976d1b1: fix: go test (@seriousm4x)

  • e124f5b86e19dc7dab59ba45e24c1f330801171e: fix: minimize destination slice to just use the broadcast string (@seriousm4x)
  • 61980c62d7d1f05995ae794e7090141325be8ccd: fix: remove global app variable (@seriousm4x)
  • 4540d8b8517a2db69a1865f321bd101f3b102db5: fix: send 4 magic packets to different address combinations #583 (@seriousm4x)

  • e98b9ba75da6e74c87684dbb95f180510121ee34: go-dep: bump golang.org/x/sys from 0.28.0 to 0.29.0 in /backend (@dependabot[bot])

entry.title: New release for UpSnap: 4.6.0
entry.content:
New Features

Device descriptions (https://github.com/seriousm4x/UpSnap/discussions/947)

Devices can now have a description to better identify them.

Auto open link (https://github.com/seriousm4x/UpSnap/discussions/847)

When waking up a device, you can now choose whether you want its link to open automatically. The link can open in a new tab, the same tab, or not at all—it's your choice.

Note: This feature is designed to open the link only if you manually click the wake button. Additionally, the link will open only in the specific browser session where the action is performed, not in others.

Changelog

Features

  • 973a1b80d0ec9c37bbcf3df9b1df39d220b5042a: feat: add device description field (@seriousm4x)
  • 0e427585131763300f8b82cd013d510af8c61d0d: feat: auto open device link after wake (@seriousm4x)

Bug fixes

  • 8906b2b6cea9ddefd156b7346a88cc58b42c8b89: fix: dependabot ignore major releases (@seriousm4x)
  • 8cb100552d2c3cd0521f5183b5d71e58d2370fc1: fix: grammar in shutdown description (@seriousm4x)

Others

  • 558e6484d09b4b249ed1e4c40d67744303d6c2fd: format (@seriousm4x)
  • c926eb792e9bda80a912b95abbea42122ebd9fbe: pnpm format (@seriousm4x)

Go dependencies

  • eea7ff492b6db7ba36664fbd3512e240fc5aa64d: go-dep: bump github.com/pocketbase/pocketbase in /backend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 567fa46e77e1f5a5d0700e4bb61fdb447d80d118: go-dep: bump github.com/prometheus-community/pro-bing in /backend (@dependabot[bot])

Npm dependencies

  • d36da86fb748c89c93eff6960529e200d4cf397d: Revert "npm-dep: bump tailwindcss from 3.4.17 to 4.0.0 in /frontend" (@seriousm4x)
  • 4f015fbeee7d94162207f12ba89e655cb3d585de: npm-dep: bump @sveltejs/kit from 2.15.3 to 2.16.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 5189a2cbf2f1d0f02ee176bef479186276c84bfb: npm-dep: bump @sveltejs/kit from 2.16.0 to 2.16.1 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 42d35dfbd604b9cc565039b650b415f8e7103b72: npm-dep: bump pocketbase from 0.25.0 to 0.25.1 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 09d856e8ebe477b99f75735caa65c274dcde489c: npm-dep: bump tailwindcss from 3.4.17 to 4.0.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • 9cd8cb21c92d50efcac54eca9a6e445a4d4bb74e: npm-dep: bump typescript-eslint from 8.20.0 to 8.21.0 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
  • ef58ce188a743360c3ba9f8dcf9265612673bb95: npm-dep: bump vite from 5.4.11 to 5.4.12 in /frontend (@dependabot[bot])
